name: Double Guys Spin
description:
My submission for GGJ2022. The theme of GGJ2022 is "duality". I want to relax, so I made this game.( spent much less time to make a game than most participants do )

"Double Guys Spin" is a game about black&&white dimensions. The  player can generate a doppelganger in another dimension and push blocks. Your goal is to reach all the stars.

Using PuzzleScript to make this game.

2022GlobalGameJam的摆烂之作，原定的游戏名是"All I Want Is Bailan"，后来想的是"Two Dimension"，后来BW帮忙起名"Double Guys Spin"，就叫这个了。中文是二人转。
